channel.title: Frontend on Thomas Coopman - Infinite Tree
channel.description: Recent content in Frontend on Thomas Coopman - Infinite Tree

item.title: A big ball of frontend
item.description: Tonight I’m giving a talk at Fronteers about Frontend microservices. Mind you, I don’t want to go into what a microservice is, so a talk about Frontend services is fine as well. What is important for me is that we’re not building a big ball of frontend. We’re paying so much attention to having a good architecture on the backend, with lots of (micro)services but at the same time, we’re building one huge single page application (SPA).
